definitions.title: Niph
definitions.body: take one's stand, stand (NH [[נִצָּב]] id. (rare), [[הַצָּבָה]] n. taking a stand; Ph. (Pun.) [[נחב]], [[מנחבת]], [[מחבת]] monument Lzb:325; Nab. Palm. [[נחב]] set up; Zinj. id., statue, all Lzb:325 Cook:82; Palm. [[מחבא]] image, Nab. [[נחב]] id., DHM:VOJ viii (1894), 12, cf. Lzb:l.c.; perhaps As. naṣâbu Tel Am, Wkl:TA 24*b; Aram. [[נְחַב]], ns.ab; Ar. nas.aba set up, erect, nas.bun sign, mark, way-mark; Sab. [[נחב]] cippus CIS:iv. 23 Sab Denkm:95 DHM:ZMG xxx (1876), 115 f. Derenb:Jas, 1883, Aug.–Sept. 244; Min. [[מחב]] statue (= [[מנחב]] HOM:Südar. Chrest. 128);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: station oneself, take one's stand, for definite purpose, c. [[עַל]] loc. (by, on) Ge 24:13, Ge 24:43, Ge 28:13, Ex 7:15, Ex 33:21, Ex 34:2 (all J), Ex 17:9, Ex 18:14 (E), Nu 23:6, Nu 23:17 (JE); Am 7:7, Am 9:1, Pr 8:2; of ´[[י]] Is 3:13 taketh his stand to plead; c. [[ב]] loc. Ex 5:20, Ps 82:1 (of God), cf. Nu 22:23, Nu 22:31; Nu 22:34; [[עִמְּכָה]] ´[[נ]] 1Sa 1:26; ´[[לִפְנֵי י]] De 29:9; c. [[פֶתַח]] Nu 16:27 (JE), Ju Jdg 18:16, Jdg 18:17; abs. La 2:4 (on text v. Löhr).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: stand = be stationed (by appointment, or in fulfilment of duty), c. [[עַל]] pers. (sitting or lying) Ge 45:1, 1Sa 4:20, 1Sa 22:6, 1Sa 22:7, 1Sa 22:17; [[לְַ־מִשְׁמַרְתַּי]] ´[[נ]] Is 21:8 stand at my watchman's post (‖[[עׂמֵד]]); [[לִמִינְְ]] Ps 45:10; abs. 2Sa 13:31.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: take an upright position, stand, ´[[יׇקוּמוּ וְנ]] Ex 33:8 (E; + [[פֶּתַח]] loc.), cf. Ge 37:7 (E; of sheaf); of waters, [[כְמוֹ־נֵד]] ´[[נ]] Ex 15:8 (song).
be stationed = appointed over ([[על]]), 1Sa 22:9, Ru 2:5, Ru 2:6; with Samuel presiding over ([[על]]) them 1Sa 19:20. Hence
Pt. as subst. deputy, prefect (as appointed, deputed), only 1Ki 4:5, 1Ki 4:7, 1Ki 5:7, 1Ki 5:30, 1Ki 9:23, 2Ch 8:10 (all of Sol.'s officers; so also 2Ch 8:10 Qr, < Kt [[נחיב]]), 1Ki 22:48 (of Edom).

stand firm, fig. [[כָּל־אָדָם נִצָּב]] Ps 39:6 every man, (even) the firm-standing, is wholly vanity (but expression strange, and text dub.); [[בַּשָּׁמָָיִם]] ´[[נ]] Ps 119:89 (of ´[[י]]'s word); that which stands firm Zec 11:16 (Isr. under fig. of sheep), but dub.; We GASm leave untranslated; Now prop. [[הַנַּחֲלָה]] diseased.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִצִּיב]] 1Ki 16:34; 2 ms. [[הִצַּבְתָּ]] Ge 21:29, Ps 74:17; 3 mpl. [[הִצִּ֫יבוּ]] Je 5:26; Impf. [[יַצִּיב]] Jos 6:26, [[יַצֵּב]] De 32:8 (dub.; poet. for ´[[וַיּ]] Ew:§ 233a Di; rhythmical shortening Ges:§ 109 k; read [[יַצִּב]] Dr Da:Synt. p. 94), [[וַיַּצֶּב־]] 2Sa 18:18; sf. [[וַיַּצִּיבֵ֫נוּ]] La 3:12 Imv. fs. [[הַצִּ֫יבִי]] Je 31:21; Inf. cstr. [[הַצִּיב]] 1Sa 13:21, 1Ch 18:3; Pt. [[מַצִּיב]] 1Sa 15:12 (but rd. [[הִצִּיב]] LXX We Dr Bu Kit HPS):—
station, set: c. acc., ewes Ge 21:28, Ge 21:29 (E; [[לְבַד]] apart), trap Je 5:26; fig. set me before thee ([[לְפָנֶיְ]]) Ps 41:13; set me as a target La 3:12.

set up, erect pillar ([[מַצֵּבָה]]) Ge 35:14, Ge 35:20 (E), 2Sa 18:18, + [[אֲשֵׁרִים]] 2Ki 17:10; altar Ge 33:20 (E), stone-heap 2Sa 18:17; monument ([[יַד]]) 1Sa 15:12; city-gates (c. [[ב]]), Jos 6:26 (JE) = 1Ki 16:34.
cause to stand erect, waters, [[בְּמוֹ־נֵד]] Ps 78:13 (cf.

fix, establish boundary (subj. ´[[י]]) De 32:8, Ps 74:17, Pr 15:25; dominion ([[יַד]]) 1Ch 18:3 (of king).—1Sa 13:21 is dub.; AV sharpen, RV set; Kit ‘gerade machen’; Klo [[נִצַּב]] subst., v. infr.; cf. HPS.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֻצַּב]] Na 2:8 it is fixed, determined (Kl Or), but very dub.; perh. n. pr., or epith., of queen, cf. We Now GASm, q. v,; Pt. [[סֻלָּם נֻצּב אַ֫רְחָה]] Ge 28:12 (E) a ladder set up on the earth; ´[[אֵלוֹן מ]] Ju Jdg 9:6, read [[אֵלוֹן הַמַּצֵּבָה]] GFM, v. infr.—Cf. also [[יחב]]
